None.Name: Wrecking Hammer
None.Description: Active to thrust Jorne's giant hammer onto the ground dealing heavy damage to surrounding structures. Every building or barrier within a 20m radius takes 1800 damage, up to 5400 damage is dealt in total. Units generally take very little damage but every small or medium unit within the affected area will be knocked back. Reusable every 20 seconds.

None.Name: Giant Shelter
None.Description: Jorne is surrounded by an air of invulnerability and shelter that benefits his fellow leaders. Every other Legendary Unit within a 20m radius takes 50% less damage.
